trials.page_content: Zorxon is the overlord of Dax. Everyone loves Zorxon because she provides for all the aliens of Dax. However, Zorxon is now very old and she rarely makes public appearances anymore.

Apaffs are a nuisance for the aliens. They make burrows everywhere  including in the middle of farmland and in front of their houses. But most aliens find apaffs cute, and tolerate them to some extent.

Krens are a tribe of the aliens that live on the continent of Benli, which has no agriculture. Animals like stups, four-legged creatures with large antlers, are an important resource for the Krens. Stups roam all over the windy highlands of Benli, far from the oceans. Krens work as stup-herders and Krens work as fishermen.
Kazzes are a kind of plant that grow all over Dax. They produce fruit in the springtime, but the fruit is poisonous to animals. No feps eat kazzes nor do they come close.

Vimbles are social insects that live in colonies of up to a thousand individuals. They have a single queen, who must find somewhere to hibernate over the winter before  starting a new colony. Vimble queens hibernate in fallen logs   and hibernate in the abandoned burrows of other animals.
trials.predicate_2: hibernate in the abandoned burrows of other animals

trials.page_content: Wopis only live in the desert and they all are very hard to find. Wopis sleep during the day to avoid the heat.

Ollers spend most of their lives in water, but occasionally come on land to gather berries. Ollers use tools on land, which are passed down from parents to children, so that each family only has one of each kind of tool. While on land, ollers carry their young in guklags and carry their young in trullets.

Supools are the biggest creatures on Dax. They all live in the oceans and all of them live for a very long time. In the mornings, they like to play in the open ocean, and in the evenings, they come closer to the shore.
trials.predicate_2: live for a very long time

trials.page_content: Nannus only feed on rare flowers called lodeks. Most lodeks only  bloom for one day a year, and most have purple petals.
trials.query_predicate: only bloom for one day a year
trials.predicate_1: only bloom for one day a year

trials.page_content: Kweps hunt in packs. Even though they are pack animals, all of them have their own unique preferences. They hunt at night, looking for creatures sleeping alone. Right before they go hunting, the kweps chew on xorfun and tunkel.
Wint lived a long time ago in the mountains. He loved to travel. All aliens remember Wint and admire him because he was the one that found the lost city of Baff.

Mooks are ferocious creatures that live on the continent of Benli. Benli has dramatic elevation changes  unlike any other continent on Dax. Mooks have territories at the tops of tall mountains and the bottom of deep canyons.
trials.query_predicate: have territories at the tops of tall mountains
trials.predicate_1: have territories at the tops of tall mountains
trials.predicate_2: have territories at the bottom of deep canyons

trials.page_content: Blins are small creatures. They all have hollow bones and fly. They sing beautiful songs to attract mates.
The Ludinos are an alien tribe. They are very industrious and they all are highly spiritual. They ascribe to the Caboo religion and they ascribe to the Daith religion.

Plovs travel in herds and are very territorial. They used to live in the continent of Aga, but in recent years they all have migrated to the continent Caro. Now that they have their own territory, they are never attacked by other creatures.
trials.query_predicate: live in the continent of Aga
trials.predicate_1: live in the continent of Aga

trials.page_content: Isooms are tree-like plants that are found in hilly regions. Their fruit is edible, and the aliens often cultivate isooms for food. Isooms produce fruit with bumpy skin and produce fruit with smooth skin.

Zorf the mapmaker lives in the large forest city of Astom. In Astom, there are many ways to get from place to place, but the most popular way is through tunnels. All of the Astom aliens use the tunnels to get around town from their homes in the residential quarter. Since all of the Astom aliens live there, it's very crowded at night.
trials.query_predicate: use the tunnels to get around town
trials.predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: Fengnors are smaller, nocturnal creatures. They have highly complex mating habits. They mate for life, and the males often bring twigs and leaves to the females during courtship. The mated pairs use these twigs and leaves to build their nests. They build their nests in gluers and they build their nests in droops.
Mupors are very social creatures. Most of them live in extended family groups. Most of them also build large triangular rebos made of clay and grass.

The soil on the continent of Aga is very fertile, and the aliens have learned to grow many crops. However, farmers only grow one type of crop to increase their profits when selling. During the springtime, the aliens flood their fields to plant fujusi and the aliens flood their fields to plant soroneeks.
trials.query_predicate: flood their fields to plant fujusi
trials.predicate_1: flood their fields to plant fujusi
trials.predicate_2: burn their fields to plant soroneeks

trials.page_content: Yomis are small insect-like creatures. They all live in the  borderland woodlands. They all fly towards the mountains in search of food, but they need to be careful  of their natural predators, turmens.
trials.predicate_2: fly towards the mountains in search of food

trials.page_content: The morseth lives part of its life in the sea and part of its life on land. Most morseths build permanent structures called fendles in order to bury their dead  kin, and fendles are usually made out of wood.
trials.predicate_2: come on land to find mates

trials.page_content: The aliens have many different kinds of specialized skills and trades, such as basket weaving. To  help make themselves known, crafters join guilds with other crafters of the same trade. Basket weavers are part of the Tinno guild  and are part of the Farza guild.
trials.query_predicate: are part of the Tinno guild
trials.predicate_1: are part of the Tinno guild
trials.predicate_2: are part of the Farza guild

trials.page_content: The weather on Dax is very constant, not changing much from day to day. Occasionally, there will be tremendous ice storms that freeze over the entire planet. These ice storms never last long or result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax. However, the ice storms make the entire sky as dark as night.
trials.query_predicate: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax
trials.predicate_1: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax

trials.page_content: Glippets are large creatures with a life-span of about  sixty years. They live on the southern continent of Caro and on the northern continent of Este.
trials.query_predicate: live on the continent of Caro
trials.predicate_1: live on the continent of Caro
trials.predicate_2: live on the continent of Este

catch_trials.property: taifles have gold spots that are sticky
no plovs live in the continent of Aga
lorches have long legs and breathe underwater
all supools live in the oceans
all Astom aliens use the tunnels to get around town
cranoor is the king of all beings
